name: The Mystery in the Campus: The Assassin
name_original: The Mystery in the Campus: The Assassin
description:
Plot:

Break-Up University, the best and the most popular university in the certain city in amplified Bohol, has a lot of things inside. Young celebrities, smartest students, talented actors and musicians, and pure, fresh faces are welcoming in this university. There are clusters of clubs separately in every classrooms during recess and lunch breaks. Five clubs are considered most popular clubs on the entire university. Popular clubs, like SSG, Science Club, Host Club, Cultural Arts Club, and Girls Night Out Club, loved by thousands of students. Finally, this university will be the best university in every senior has it all.

On the other hand, this university has a serious mystery. A special student, named Gian Carlo, 19, enrolled in this university in June 9, 2016, and enters in June 13, 2016. While entering the campus, he suprisingly found three students, Ju Hyoung, Janille, and Bianca--members of the Host Club. They met and explains this university until he enters to the centrum of the university. Suddenly, he met the school detective, McNeil, and he let Gian Carlo become the 'detective' of this university. On June 20, McNeil and Gian Carlo discovered a strange student was shot at the gymnasium. Gian Carlo figured out that there is the 'assassin' in this university. The biggest question was: Who's the suspect shot the victim? Who is the "assassin" in this university?

You need to figure out by playing this new game in eight levels, the prologue and the seven days of investigation. Complete the mystery to reveal the suspect! Be a "school detective" by playing this new game, The Mystery in the Campus - The Assassin!

Game Features:

  • Mission-Linked Algorithm Event System - a series of events that triggers any event during one mission or other parts (in RPG Maker MV)
  • Missions in certain clubs (vary in days of investigation)
  • Character pinpointing system
  • Collecting evidences to reveal secret rooms including secrets! (after finishing the game)
  • Increasing club reputation points by completing club missions
  • Detective rate calculation
  • Improved side-scrolling fight scenes
